"Multani, Yavimaya's Avatar" is a Legendary Creature — Elemental Avatar card from the Dominiaria set, featuring artwork by Ryan Yee. It has a mana cost of {4}{W}{W}, and comes with the abilities of Reach and Trample. This mythic rarity card allows Multani to gain +1/+1 for each land you control and each land card in your graveyard. For {1}{W}, you can return two lands you control to their owner's hand to bring Multani back from your graveyard to your hand. This card is presented in French.
The earliest released set that contains cards with foreign translations is the Fourth Edition.

The most common language for the foreign cards available in the dataset is Italian.

The `Bioessence Hydra` is a rare Creature — Kraken card illustrated by Mathias Kollros, available in arena, mtgo, and paper formats. It costs {3}{G}{U}, has a power and toughness of 4/4, and features the Trample ability. It enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter for each loyalty counter on planeswalkers you control, and gains additional +1/+1 counters whenever loyalty counters are added to your planeswalkers. The card is printed in Green and Blue, and is also available in Chinese Traditional.

In the card game set C16, the mythic card "Sidar Kondo of Jamuraa" is a Legendary Creature — Human Knight, illustrated by Ryan Alexander Lee. It has a mana cost of {2}{G}{W}, power of 2, and toughness of 5. The card features abilities like Flanking and Partner and imposes blocking restrictions, making it a formidable option in gameplay.
The average converted mana cost of cards that have been printed in sets released in the year 2019 is 5.0.

The card "Fruit of Tizerus" is a common Sorcery in the THB set, illustrated by Bastien L. Deharme. It has a mana cost of {B}. The card's effect is that the target player loses 2 life, and it features an Escape ability costing {3}{B} with the requirement to exile three other cards from your graveyard to recast it from there. The flavor text describes a spiny tree with bitter fruit growing in the realm of Tizerus, outside the palace of Erebos.
